Package de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter

Interface Utils

public interface Utils
Utility class.
Author:
markiewb, bahlef

  • Method Summary

    Static Methods 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static boolean isJava​(javax.swing.text.Document document)
    Checks if the mime type of a given Document is text/x-java and returns true if it is, otherwise false.

  • Method Details

    • isJava

      static boolean isJava​(javax.swing.text.Document document)
      Checks if the mime type of a given Document is text/x-java and returns true if it is, otherwise false.
      Parameters:
      document - the Document where to check the mime type
      Returns:
      true if the mime type is text/x-java, otherwise false
